name: ng4-select2
description: Angular2 wrapper for select2. A fork from https://github.com/NejcZdovc/ng2-select2
author: Luiz Oliveira <luizoliveira@outlook.com>

scripts.finish: mv lib/ng4-select2.component.ts.bak lib/ng4-select2.component.ts && cp README.md dist && rimraf dist/ng4-select2.component.css
scripts.build: rimraf dist && ts-node tools/inline-styles.ts && tsc -p tsconfig-esm.json && rollup -c rollup.config.js dist/ng4-select2.js > dist/ng4-select2.bundle.js && cp package.json dist && ts-node tools/cleanup.ts && ngc -c tsconfig-esm.json && npm run finish
